text.0: hold fast your godlike sway o somarudra let these our sacrifices quickly reach you.
text.1: placing in every house your seven great treasures bring blessing to our quadrupeds and bipeds.
text.2: soma and rudra chase to every quarter the sickness that hath visited our dwelling.
text.3: drive nirrti away into the distance and give us excellent and happy glories.
text.4: provide o somarudra for our bodies all needful medicines to heal and cure us.
text.5: set free and draw away the sin committed which we have still inherent in our persons.
text.6: armed with keen shafts and weapons kind and loving be gracious unto us soma and rudra.
text.7: release us from the noose of varuṇa keep us from sorrow in your tender lovingkindness.
